title: India’s Economy Grows 8.2% in Q2, Beats Forecasts
excerpt: India’s economy posted a strong 8.2% year-on-year growth in Q2 2025, surpassing forecasts and boosting investor confidence.

title: India’s Stock Markets Hit Record High After 14-Month Rally
excerpt: Indian equity indices surged to record highs, driven by easing valuations and upbeat corporate earnings outlook.

title: Gold Prices Climb as Investors Bet on US Rate Cut
excerpt: Gold prices surged in India today, as global investors bet on a possible US interest-rate cut, prompting a rush to safe-haven assets.

title: IMF Reclassifies India’s Exchange Rate Regime, Markets Watch Closely
excerpt: The IMF reclassified India’s exchange-rate policy regime — a move that could impact forex outlook and investor sentiment.

title: India’s GDP Expected to Grow 7.3% in Q2
excerpt: Government sources signal that India’s quarterly GDP may expand by 7.3% in Q2, driven by manufacturing output and steady services demand.

title: Sensex and Nifty Open Flat Amid Global Cues
excerpt: Indian benchmark indices started Tuesday’s session little changed as traders tracked mixed signals from Asian and US markets.

title: RBI Report Highlights Strong Investment Climate
excerpt: The Reserve Bank of India’s latest bulletin notes that private capital expenditure pipelines remain robust despite global uncertainty.

title: India’s Manufacturing Growth Slows in November
excerpt: Industry trackers say factory output moderated in November as export orders softened and firms worked through inventories.

title: India–Canada Trade Discussions Resume
excerpt: Negotiators from India and Canada met in New Delhi to restart talks on a trade agreement after a months-long pause.

title: Ayodhya Ram Mandir Inauguration Preparations Intensify
excerpt: Authorities in Ayodhya accelerated security, transport, and hospitality plans ahead of the Ram Mandir inauguration ceremony.

title: Tripura Marks 150 Years of ‘Vande Mataram’
excerpt: Tripura hosted cultural programs and youth parades to celebrate 150 years since ‘Vande Mataram’ was composed.

title: OnePlus 15 India Launch Expectations Grow
excerpt: Tech enthusiasts anticipate camera and battery upgrades as OnePlus readies its flagship 15 series for the Indian market.

title: Tulsi Vivah Celebrations Across India
excerpt: Devotees performed traditional rituals and community feasts to mark Tulsi Vivah, ushering in the winter wedding season.

title: India’s Digital Payments Hit Fresh Monthly Record
excerpt: UPI transactions crossed a new high in October as merchants in smaller towns embraced QR-based payments.

title: Western Ghats Wildlife Corridor Declared to Protect Elephants and Biodiversity
excerpt: Indian Government designates 1,200 sq km area in Western Ghats as protected wildlife corridor to safeguard migrating elephants and rich biodiversity.

title: Delhi Airport Incident: Afghan Plane Lands on Wrong Runway, Probe Launched
excerpt: A flight from Kabul mistakenly landed on the wrong runway at Delhi’s IGI Airport — no casualties reported, but an official investigation has been ordered.

title: Eastern Coast Braces as Severe Cyclone Warning Issued
excerpt: A red alert has been issued along India’s eastern coastline as a severe cyclone approaches — coastal districts begin evacuation procedures.

title: India Launches Massive Solar Farm Project; Rural Electrification Boost Expected
excerpt: Government greenlights a new mega-solar farm project aimed at electrifying rural India and meeting renewable energy targets.

title: Trade Unions Stage Nationwide Protests Against New Labour Codes
excerpt: Major trade unions across India have begun large-scale protests against newly implemented labour laws, demanding rollback of key provisions.

title: Major Trade Deal On Table: India-US Negotiations Enter Final Stage
excerpt: India and the United States have reportedly moved to final-stage talks over a major trade agreement — a deal that could reshape exports and bilateral trade relations.

title: Weekly Roundup: Trends Shaping 2025
excerpt: A curated selection of developments across tech, society, and design.

title: Global Tech Markets React to New Policy
excerpt: Major indices shift as regulators outline a new framework for cross-border innovation.
